results.name: Nurse 5
results.reason: Closest to Herzliya (Raanana ~6–8 km), full availability overlap, high rating (4.42/50). Lacks explicit Emergency Care/Critical Care tags but strong mobility/bedridden experience; good for urgent dispatch due to proximity.

results.name: Nurse 1
results.reason: Near Herzliya (Netanya ~12–15 km), full availability, solid rating (4.23/169) and many reviews; no Emergency/Critical tags but broad patient-mobility skills make rapid help plausible.

results.name: Nurse 3
results.reason: Also Netanya proximity, full availability, good rating (4.38/61); overlap in mobility/bedridden care. Slightly fewer reviews than Nurse 1 hence ranked just below.

results.name: Nurse 9
results.reason: Tel Aviv (~10–15 km), full availability, strong rating (4.51/106). No explicit Emergency/Critical experience but capable general/mobility care; suitable for urgent call within metro area.

results.name: Nurse 10
results.reason: Bnei Brak (~12–18 km), full availability, solid rating (4.43/108) and comprehensive mobility/bedridden skills; viable urgent option though slightly farther than top picks.
